title: Searching for a Duo Q parter (Silver-Gold) for season 6
body:
Hey im Darkscythe99 and searching for an ADC my main role is Mid but also Support and im actually pretty good at supporting ^^ . So if you are an ADC with an elo like Silver-Gold then just add me and write to me then we can play some test matches :D. I got Skype and Teamspeak so we can talk together and its no problem. 
I can speak English,German and Russian so if you can speak some of these language pretty good then pls just write to me and i would be happy abot it :D. 
My Main supps are Thresh,Alistar and Blitzcrank 

Happy to hear from you your Darkscythe99 (also my ingame name) :-D{{summoner:21}}
